snippet: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, Myanmar’s chief opposition leader, said Wednesday that her actions on a recent visit to Thailand gave no cause for anyone to be unhappy.
abstract: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, Myanmar’s chief opposition leader, says that her actions on a recent visit to Thailand gave no cause for anyone to be unhappy; she had spoken frankly to an audience that included corporate executives at the World Economic Forum about potential difficulties for foreign investors in Myanmar, undercutting the government’s message that Myanmar was ready for investment
lead_paragraph: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, Myanmar’s chief opposition leader, said Wednesday that her actions on a recent visit to Thailand gave no cause for anyone to be unhappy.

headline.main: Myanmar: Dissident Defends Remarks Made on Thailand Trip
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Dissident Defends Remarks Made on Thailand Trip
